title: Farmers Welfare Training Program
detail:
Bothi Agro FPC and VAMNICOM Pune, in collaboration with the Warehousing Development and Regulatory Authority (WDRA), conducted a comprehensive Farmers Welfare Training Program at Village Bothi and Taluka Dharmabad. The event witnessed the enthusiastic participation of over 150 farmers who registered for the training.
The primary focus of the program was to provide farmers with valuable insights into the warehousing facilities offered by both central and state governments. These facilities play a crucial role in enhancing agricultural productivity and ensuring the safe storage of produce, thereby preventing post-harvest losses and improving market access.
 Officials from VAMNICOM Pune and the Government Warehouse shared their expertise and knowledge with the farmers. They provided detailed guidance on the benefits of using government-regulated warehouses, including improved storage conditions, better quality maintenance, and access to credit facilities. The officials also discussed the procedures for registering and utilizing these warehousing services, highlighting the support and subsidies available to farmers.
The training program was well-received by the participants, who appreciated the opportunity to learn about the advanced warehousing solutions and how they could leverage these facilities to boost their agricultural practices. The event underscored the commitment of Bothi Agro FPC, VAMNICOM Pune, and WDRA to empower farmers through education and support, fostering a more robust and resilient agricultural sector in the region.

title: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet
detail: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, comes from a line in section 1.10.32.
